mapper.sql: qg.uuid, qg.name, qg.is_built_in as isBuiltIn, qg.ai_code_supported as aiCodeSupported, qg.created_at as createdAt, qg.updated_at as updatedAt
m.short_name as description, qgc.operator as operator, m.val_type as valueType, qgc.value_error as errorThreshold
mapper.insert: insert into quality_gates (uuid, name, is_built_in, ai_code_supported, created_at, updated_at) values (#{uuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isBuiltIn, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{aiCodeSupported, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{createdAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM quality_gates qg ORDER BY qg.name ASC

select
from quality_gates qg where name in #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM quality_gates qg INNER JOIN project_qgates pqg ON pqg.quality_gate_uuid = qg.uuid AND pqg.project_uuid = #{projectUuid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT
FROM quality_gates qg WHERE is_built_in = ${_true}

SELECT
FROM quality_gates qg INNER JOIN properties p ON qg.uuid = p.text_value WHERE p.prop_key = 'qualitygate.default' and p.entity_uuid is null and p.user_uuid is null

select
from quality_gates qg left join quality_gate_conditions qgc on qgc.qgate_uuid = qg.uuid left join metrics m on m.uuid = qgc.metric_uuid where qg.uuid=#{qualityGateUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
